Room.Name: Bendine Way/Nissiau Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Bendine Way and Nissiau Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Nissiau Lane heads east through the very popular shopping centers and facilities in this side of the town. Separated by the Nylandian Bay, the northwest corner of town more or less provides for itself. Bendine Way heads north and south from here.
